explains: v. 使有别于；看清，认出；区别，分清
wordGroup: distinguish oneself 使扬名；使杰出
distinguish between v. 区别；分辨

sentences.en: Could he distinguish right from wrong?
It's important to distinguish fact from fiction.
sentences.cn: 区别真实和虚构是重要的。

sentences.en: It was hard to distinguish one twin from the other.
sentences.cn: 很难分辨出一对孪生儿谁是谁。
